column4: hey this is a issue which couldnt be solved by any1... ready for this????

i use my cell nokia 6600  to connect to the internet and i use bluetooth to connect for pc .... but i tried both ubuntu 10.04 and 10.10 both seem to hate my cel..............they dont even pair with my cell :(
dude 11.04 is in alpha stage... (incomplete distro!!)
what do you need it for
to save my battery power, the kernel 2.6.37 doesn't have the power regression, https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/760131
11.04 runs a lot noisy, in laptops with reduced battery i had  tried before (a known launchpad bug #760131)... so i want a triple boot
good question, there is more than likely to be a PPA before a backport
so right now there are no ppa's to i guess? coz the unity-staging ppa wont work in oneiric
I dont directly know of one, just pointing that out
it is a custom build of mplayer to get hardware acclerated video working on amd card based systems,
not installed its built from the splitted-desktop website source,
